Hydration: Encourage patients to drink plenty of water or warm beverages like tea or chicken broth to help soothe the throat and flush out toxins.
Rest: Advise patients to rest and sleep as much as possible to help their body recover from the illness.
Nutrition: Encourage patients to eat a balanced diet rich in vitamins and minerals to help boost their immune system.
Steam therapy: Recommend inhaling steam from a hot shower or a bowl of hot water with essential oils to help clear congestion and soothe the respiratory system.
Acupuncture: Suggest acupuncture as a holistic approach to treating cold symptoms by stimulating specific points on the body to help alleviate pain and congestion.
